page.title: 04BROADBRIDGE HEATH BYPASS
page.content: At the beginning of 1982 a bypass was built avoiding the small village, {Broadbridge Heath.}Before the bypass the village was busy and dangerous for the residents.Since the bypass many improvements have taken place, plus the development of new houses.{ This bypass has not only made the village quieter and safer but also resulted in a{30% increase in trade for the{village post office.}This increase is because the villagers can pull in and out of the layby quickly without having to wait to get back into the stream of traffic as before. Many things are sold here thus saving many pensioners expensive trips to Horsham. The{petrol station}has suffered the most with{trade dropping considerably and the ownership has changed twice since the building of the bypass.
